sourcesContent:
export const artworks = [
  {
    title: "Coronation",
    artist: "Unknown artist",
    media: ["cleaning sign, porcelain sink"],
    description: "This unique sculpture, crafted to commemorate the coronation of King Charles, repurposes a humble cleaning sign, transforming it into a symbol of regal significance. The juxtaposition of the sign's utilitarian purpose with the grandeur of royalty creates a powerful visual narrative, symbolising the potential that lies within even the most ordinary objects.",
    image: "./coronation.jpg",
    year: "2023",
  },
    {
    title: "Future Thermostat",
    artist: "Unknown artist",
    media: ["printed label on plastic",],
    description: '"Future Thermostat" is a captivating artwork crafted from a plastic socket cover, meticulously transformed into a thought-provoking sculptural installation. Standing at the intersection of functionality and aesthetics, the artwork questions the role technology plays in our daily lives. Presented with a promise of future control, regulation and heat, yet with no timescale to fulfil this pledge, the viewer is left stranded in a perpetual state of anticipation and ultimately confusion. ',
    image: "./future-thermostat.jpg",
    year: "2023",
  },
    {
    title: "Transcendent Nostalgia",
    artist: "Unknown artist",
    media: ["parcel shelf, floorboards and table",],
    description: '"Transcendent Nostalgia" is a site-specific sculpture that boldly reimagines the discarded remnants of everyday objects into a thought-provoking, immersive structural installation. At the head of this structure stands an old car parcel shelf, elevated on a pedestal, serving as both the centerpiece and a symbol of forgotten journeys and stories. The parcel shelf, once a functional part of a car, is now repurposed to evoke a sense of suspended motion and transition. Its void-like form creates an immediate focal point, drawing viewers into the narrative. Propping up the parcel shelf are tongue and groove floorboards, carefully arranged to create a cascading mid-section that feels at once both solid and precarious. Their aged appearance hints at the passage of time and the accumulation of memories, inviting viewers to contemplate their own life journey."' ,
    image: "./transcendent-nostalgia.jpg",
    year: "2023",
  },
]
